Name: Absinthe Cocktail (Jerry Thomas)
Ingredients: 45 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This aniseed-flavoured mix tastes surprisingly tame but includes a shot of the notorious green fairy.
History: Adapted from Jerry Thomas' 1887 Bar-tender's Guide .
